text: North of Nevada is a 1924 American silent western film directed by Albert S. Rogell and starring Fred Thomson, Hazel Keener and Josef Swickard.Munden p.552 ==Cast== * Fred Thomson as Tom Taylor * Hazel Keener as Marion Ridgeway * Josef Swickard as Mark Ridgeway * Joe Butterworth as Red O'Shay * Chester Conklin as Lem Williams * Taylor Graves as Reginald Ridgeway * George Magrill as Joe Deerfoot * Wilfred Lucas as C. Hanaford * Silver King the Horse as Tom's Horse ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1924 films Category:1924 Western (genre) films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Albert S. Rogell Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:American black-and-white films
title: North of Nevada
